attributes.action: No organ donation veto after you die
attributes.additional_details:
At the moment if you opt in for organ donation. When you die it can be overturned by your next of kin, so no organs are donated, against your wishes.

This should be stopped, and your wishes should be carried out even if there are objections.

The government needs to make it so that no one can veto your organ donations after you die if that is your wish.  Once you sign up to the organ donation register only you can remove yourself from the it.
